title: After Class
description: Professor Richter Allen is no Prince Charming, but then again, Karrie Damron isn't Cinderella. They've been butting heads for months in the classroom, but it's Karrie's final essay on the roles of female sexuality in fairy tales that really makes the sparks fly. She thinks he's going to flunk her, but Professor Allen has other plans when he keeps her...after class.
author: Megan Hart
